thread.section_title: Americor Financial Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Americor Financial Services | americorfs.com
thread.title: Rosemary Rodriguez
thread.title_full: Americor Financial Services reviewed by Rosemary Rodriguez

author: Rosemary Rodriguez
title: Rosemary Rodriguez
text: Want to extend my appreciation to Americor's staff hard work, beginning with Alex Hsiung. It's true that as a client you have to be patient. Was a bit nervous at the beginning of the process. However anytime I would call on any issue, I would always get the information I needed. That would always ease my anxiety. My recent negotiator, Violet Munoz is Amazing. All I can say is WOW. So thankful that I received Americor's initial notice and decided to become a client.
